text: Gildardo García (9 March 1954 - 15 January 2021) was a Colombian chess player. He became Colombia's second Grandmaster in 1992. He won the Colombian national champion 10 times. In 2006, he played in the chess olympiads for Colombia. García died in Medellín, Colombia from COVID-19 on 15 January 2021, aged 66.https://twitter.com/FIDE_chess/status/1350153008005451777 ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Colombian sportspeople Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Colombia Category:Chess grandmasters
title: Gildardo García
